comment.text: This translation key displays the date a portal was created. It is used on a page displaying information about portal settings and appears as a label next to a specific field in the MainInfo component of the PortalSettings page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Created" is inaccurate. "Aangemaakt" implies something was created or constructed, which isn't quite the same as 'created' in the context of a portal being established.
The colon after 'datum' feels somewhat abrupt. While not strictly incorrect, it's not as natural as other options.

The translation 'Portal a fost creat la data de: {{date}}' is not the most natural or concise way to express 'Portal Created date: {{date}}'. 'La data de' is a bit verbose. A more fluent translation would be 'Data creării portalului: {{date}}' or 'Data creării: {{date}}'.
The word 'ද්වාරය' (dvaaraya) which translates to 'portal' is correct. However, depending on the context, 'වේබ් ාවතාරය' (web aavaataraya) might be more accurate and understandable to some users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'වේබ් ාවතාරය' (web aavaataraya) for 'portal' if it better suits the target audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '{{date}}' is consistent with the English original. Verify this placeholder is correctly handled in the Sinhala implementation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the '{{date}}' placeholder is properly rendered and replaced with the date value in the Sinhala implementation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Портал креиран датум: {{date}}' is not the most accurate translation of 'Portal Created date: {{date}}'. 'Креиран' means 'created' in the passive voice. A more accurate translation would be 'Датум креирања портала: {{date}}' (Date of portal creation).
The colon after 'дата' is slightly unusual in Serbian.  While not incorrect, it's less common than placing the colon after the noun.
The Serbian translation 'Portal kreiran datum:' is not the most natural way to express 'Portal Created date:'. A more accurate and idiomatic translation would be 'Datum kreiranja portala:'.
